title: Understanding the Impact of Data Inventory
text: When you notice a decrease in the need to invest more in security and storage, it might indicate that your data management is becoming more efficient.

hintAnswer: your inventory strategy may be starting to pay off
title: Evaluating the Effects of Data Inventory
text: Consider the reasons why you might not need to spend as much on security and storage. What could be contributing to this change?
choices: your engineers have stopped collecting data
your inventory strategy may be starting to pay off
